About Me

Im Winston Spencer, a developer who enjoys creating innovative solutions to complex problems, particularly in the areas of machine learning, distributed systems, and cloud infrastructure.

What I Do

I work on cutting-edge projects involving large language models, resource optimization, and home automation systems. My focus is on building scalable, efficient solutions that solve real-world problems.
